Good news ! Found a solution for pes2012.exe has stopped working when come to Avatar :

The point is that you need to:

1. Install PESEdit patch : from pes patch website

2. Once installed you should run the config.exe file AS AN ADMINISTRATOR (C:\Program Files\KONAMI\Pro Evolution Soccer 2012\kitserver\confix.exe) and set-up the following parameters:

*enable aspect ration correction---->Automatic
*enforcecustom resolution-----> set the *resolution you want eg. 1280x720
*enforce picture quality---------> set it to medium or high or low depending on the speed of your computer and the graphical properties
then change the tab to LOD configuration in the screen that is just open. Tick the boxes for PLAYERS(gameplay) and set all the slide bars to the minimu(100.110) then do the same for the box REFEREES(Gameplay).

3.Click on save and close the tab. Now open run the application named manager (also AS AN ADMINISTRATOR) and then just click on ATTACH. Now just go and play PES 2012 but note RUN IT AS AN ADMINISTRATOR.

@ghostweb

I'm gonna list down this step-by-step and assuming you're using Windows 7 or Vista. First, download the new patch PESEdit 2.0.1 and install it before reading this guide.

1. Do it again and run them all as Administrator. Run the "config" :

Tick Enable aspect ration correction : Automatic
Tick Enable custom resolution : 640x480
Tick Enforce picture quality : Medium

2. Click the next tab "LOD configuration" :

Tick all boxes and set it all to the lowest (100.110)

3. Click save and now run "manager" as Administrator too, and click Attach. Usually this is automatically done but just in case it hasn't been attached. Exit.

4. Now right-click pes2012.exe and click Properties, under tab Compatibility : 

Tick Run this program in compatibility mode for:
- Choose Windows XP (Service Pack 2) or 3. If it is not available, you'll have to download the drivers from Microsoft. Finally click Apply and OK

5. Now run the game and you'll be able to get through past the Avatar thing. After going to the main menu, exit the game and run again the "config" as Admnistrator and finally, under LOD Configuration, untick all boxes to reset it to default. Now run the game and start playing.

@fine_wine 

Ok so here goes the screenshots. It's in order. Install PESEdit 2012 Patch 2.6 now.

http://postimg.com/image/57000/photo-56957.jpg

Open PES 2012 folder and open "kitserver" and open config.exe as ADMINISTRATOR

http://postimg.com/image/57000/photo-56959.jpg

Follow these settings

http://postimg.com/image/57000/photo-56960.jpg

Tick all and Slide all the S3 to slide all S1,S2,S3 to the minimum to save time :) Finally, SAVE.

http://postimg.com/image/57000/photo-56961.jpg

Now open manager.exe as ADMINISTRATOR and click Attach. Usually it is automatically attach-ed but just in case like mine not yet attach-ed

http://postimg.com/image/57000/photo-56962.jpg

SUCCESS!

http://postimg.com/image/57000/photo-56963.jpg

Now right-click pes2012.exe and click Properties and follow those. Usually no need but just in case.

http://postimg.com/image/57000/photo-56964.jpg

Now open settings.exe and follow those settings. Screen mode is in Window mode. IMPORTANT!!

http://postimg.com/image/57000/photo-56965.jpg

Now finally run PES 2012 and as you can see I was able to create my avatar. :)

http://postimg.com/image/57000/photo-56966.jpg

Now you can edit your Avatar in any way you like, just like mine, cool ! :D But it was in the lowest quality, look at my Avatar's face, it is sol blur! But hang on, it ain't over yet


http://postimg.com/image/57000/photo-56967.jpg
http://postimg.com/image/57000/photo-56968.jpg
http://postimg.com/image/57000/photo-56969.jpg
http://postimg.com/image/57000/photo-56970.jpg

Now quit your PES 2012 and go back to your PES 2012 and go to "kitserver" and open config.exe as ADMINISTRATOR

http://postimg.com/image/57000/photo-56971.jpg

Simply untick all of them and SAVE !

http://postimg.com/image/57000/photo-56972.jpg

Now you're ready to play or edit your blur Avatar ! Run the game and go to Personal Data Settings and click your data and you can see your cool Avatar in a better quality like mine above :b

http://postimg.com/image/57000/photo-56973.jpg

You can even edit your Appearance and other stuffs too !

http://postimg.com/image/57000/photo-56974.jpg

Now testing the game. Exhibition, my team Liverpool vs Man Utd

http://postimg.com/image/57000/photo-56975.jpg

Game's working fine ! That's it !

NOTE : Every PESEdit 2012 Patch that is released, you need to delete the folder "kitserver" before installing, that's why you're going to repeat the above steps on config.exe again ! Have fun
